testcase.name: initializationError
testcase.error:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The plugin specification 'xml:target/cucumber-report/cucumber.xml' has a problem:
Could not load plugin class 'xml'.
Plugin specifications should have the format of PLUGIN[:[PATH|[URI [OPTIONS]]]
Valid values for PLUGIN are: html, json, junit, message, pretty, progress, rerun, summary, teamcity, testng, timeline, unused, usage
PLUGIN can also be a fully qualified class name, allowing registration of 3rd party plugins. The 3rd party plugin must implement io.cucumber.plugin.Plugin at io.cucumber.core.options.PluginOption.createCouldNotLoadClass(PluginOption.java:165) at
